name: part_001
file: tmp_【Birthdayお披露目】かわいいけどかっこいいを目指していくヴァ！！【#ときのそら生誕祭ライブ 】 [AtbVQjUesq4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora continues her performance of 'oath sign'.

subtitles.original: oath sign
subtitles.english: oath sign

subtitles.original: 最後まで楽しんでいってねー！
subtitles.english: Enjoy until the very end!

subtitles.original: 力をかざして
subtitles.english: Holding up my power,

subtitles.original: ためらいを消した
subtitles.english: I've erased my hesitation.

subtitles.original: あげたかったのは 未来で
subtitles.english: What I wanted to give you was the future,

subtitles.original: 泣いてる夜 抱いたまま
subtitles.english: while still embracing the nights of tears.

subtitles.original: 嘆きを叫んで
subtitles.english: Shouting out my grief,

subtitles.original: 踏み出した足元
subtitles.english: at my feet as I step forward,

subtitles.original: 遠くの理想が そっと 癒してゆく
subtitles.english: a distant ideal gently heals me.

subtitles.original: 確かな絆を強く握り 誓おう
subtitles.english: Let's swear, gripping our certain bond tightly.

subtitles.original: どこまでも
subtitles.english: No matter how far...

subtitles.original: 迷いなく 目を開いて
subtitles.english: without any doubt, opening my eyes,

subtitles.original: 振り払って 手を伸ばそう
subtitles.english: shaking it off, let's reach out our hands.

subtitles.original: 汚れきった 奇跡を 背に
subtitles.english: With a stained miracle behind us.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 作詞・作曲 kemu
subtitles.english: Haikei Doppelganger / Lyrics & Music: kemu

subtitles.original: 突如 鏡にボッシュート
subtitles.english: Suddenly, I'm sucked into the mirror.

subtitles.original: なんの冗談か目を擦ってみる
subtitles.english: I rub my eyes, wondering if it's some joke.

subtitles.original: 影が脱ぎだして
subtitles.english: My shadow starts to peel away,

subtitles.original: どうせまた向こうは笑ってる
subtitles.english: and the other side is surely laughing again.

subtitles.original: もう一人自分がいたらって あなたは言いました
subtitles.english: You said, "If only there were another me."

subtitles.original: そんな真摯な願いが僕を呼んだのさ
subtitles.english: That sincere wish is what called me here.

subtitles.original: 悔やんでがたとも 悲しきすべてのエージェント
subtitles.english: Regret or not, oh, all you sorrowful agents.

subtitles.original: 片手間半端な覚悟 最低な意味不明な感情
subtitles.english: A half-hearted resolve, the worst nonsensical emotions.

subtitles.original: ねえこんなことに楽になる言葉があるんです
subtitles.english: Hey, there's a word that makes all this easier.

subtitles.original: 123で代わってしまえば 僕は君のドッペル
subtitles.english: Switch on 1, 2, 3 and I'll be your Doppelganger.

subtitles.original: 含み笑いで messiah you
subtitles.english: With a smirk, I'm your messiah.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you, who are you?

subtitles.original: ああ混濁と交差して 僕は僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, crossing with confusion, who am I, who am I?

subtitles.original: 有無も言わせぬ 勧善懲悪は
subtitles.english: An uncompromising poetic justice

subtitles.original: 居場所なんて残りはしない
subtitles.english: leaves no place for anyone to stay.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 誰は誰は君？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who is who to you?

subtitles.original: 蝕まれちゃ存在に 世界が気付かない
subtitles.english: The world doesn't notice a corroded existence.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼やまない ためもない
subtitles.english: Ah, it doesn't stop, no hesitation.

subtitles.original: 奇跡の輪廻が 狂って 世界を埋め上げてるパッパッ
subtitles.english: The cycle of miracles goes mad, filling up the world.

subtitles.original: 透明な顔が可笑しい 月曜日
subtitles.english: A strange transparent face on a Monday.

subtitles.original: ひとつふたつと崩れゆく つじつまが
subtitles.english: One by one, the consistency crumbles away.

subtitles.original: 僕を疑いする
subtitles.english: I start to doubt myself.

subtitles.original: お前は一体誰だと
subtitles.english: Asking, "Who the hell are you?"

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って知らない 君の尻拭いなんて真っ平
subtitles.english: Wait, I don't know you. I hate cleaning up your mess.

subtitles.original: そうやって このまま 影は溶けゆく
subtitles.english: And just like that, the shadow dissolves.

subtitles.original: 僕はなんなんだろう
subtitles.english: What even am I?

subtitles.original: ねえ どうか存在を返して
subtitles.english: Hey, please, give me back my existence.

subtitles.original: 愛もサヨナラも ぐっちゃぐちゃで ゼンブここにあって
subtitles.english: Love and goodbyes are all a mess, all here.

subtitles.original: もうあなたはもうここにいないこと分かってるんでしょ
subtitles.english: You already know you're not here anymore, right?

subtitles.original: ねえ おわったの お前がいただけ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's over. You were just there.

subtitles.original: このまま前はなかった
subtitles.english: There was no future from here.

subtitles.original: 含み笑いで messiah you
subtitles.english: With a smirk, I'm your messiah.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you, who are you?

subtitles.original: ああ混濁と交差して 僕は僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, crossing with confusion, who am I, who am I?

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 独奏が震わせた
subtitles.english: Ah, the solo performance made it tremble.

subtitles.original: 命の椅子は一つだけ
subtitles.english: There's only one seat for life.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 誰は誰は君？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who is who to you?

subtitles.original: 零れ落ちた一粒を かき集める前に
subtitles.english: Before gathering up a single fallen drop,

subtitles.original: いたっていい 何でもいい
subtitles.english: it's fine to exist, anything is fine.

subtitles.original: 器をください 狂った 世界が埋め上げてるパッパッ
subtitles.english: Give me a vessel. The crazy world is filling up.

subtitles.original: どうせ死ぬなら 誰にも知られないまま
subtitles.english: If I'm to die anyway, I'd rather no one know.

subtitles.original: 夢に抱かれて 眠るように
subtitles.english: Like falling asleep, embraced by a dream.

subtitles.original: 独りでいたいなら
subtitles.english: If you want to be alone,

subtitles.original: 鏡の中の 偽物として
subtitles.english: as a fake inside the mirror,

subtitles.original: 僕のほうがちゃんと 君を演じてやるから
subtitles.english: I'll play the part of you much better,

subtitles.original: 君の続きの誰か ちゃんと救わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: so I must save whoever follows you.

subtitles.original: 僕はわかっているんだろう 何をすればいいかさ
subtitles.english: I suppose I know what I should do.

subtitles.original: どうか誰か僕に奇跡をくれよ
subtitles.english: Please, someone, give me a miracle.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you, who are you?

subtitles.original: ああ混濁と交差して 僕は僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, crossing with confusion, who am I, who am I?

subtitles.original: もう止まらない 戻れない
subtitles.english: I can't stop anymore, can't go back.

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは 君の
subtitles.english: Well, hello there. I'm yours...

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 誰は誰は僕？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who is who to me?

subtitles.original: 蝕まれちゃ存在に 世界が気付かない
subtitles.english: The world doesn't notice a corroded existence.
